```{r}
mcu <- read.csv("mcu_boxoffice.csv")
head(mcu)
```

```{r}
plot(x=mcu$Budget, y=mcu$RottenTomato)
y1 = lm(mcu$RottenTomato~mcu$Budget)
abline(y1)
```

```{r}
plot(x=mcu$RottenTomato, y=mcu$TotalReceipts)
y2 = lm(mcu$TotalReceipts~mcu$RottenTomato)
abline(y2)
cor(mcu$TotalReceipts, mcu$RottenTomato)
```

```{r}
mcu$Film[mcu$Budget==max(mcu$Budget)]
```
